verses.roman:
cāturmāsya-ante punaḥ nityānande lañā
kibā yukti kare nitya nibhṛte vasiyā

synonyms: cāturmāsya-ante—at the end of Cāturmāsya; punaḥ—again; nityānande—Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu; lañā—taking into confidence; kibā—what; yukti kare—They consult; nitya—daily; nibhṛte—in a solitary place; vasiyā—sitting.
translation: At the end of the four-month Cāturmāsya period, Caitanya Mahāprabhu again consulted with Nityānanda Prabhu daily in a solitary place. No one could understand what Their consultation was about.
